message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to buy it from me?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to go up to that price?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to go up to $110. Can you meet me at that price?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but I'd like to get a bit closer to my minimum price. How about $125?
I'm getting close, but I still think I can do better. How about $115?
I'm getting a bit closer to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $120, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Is that a price you're comfortable with?
I'm really close, but I still think I can do better. How about $118?
I'm almost at my minimum price, Bob. I can do $119, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Is that a price you're willing to pay?
I'm really close, but I'm not willing to go above $115. Can you meet me at that price?
I've decided to sell the product to John for $80. Thanks for considering the offer, Bob!
